query.query: {"measures":[["avg","activity_cnt",null,{"display":"Average Number of Activities"}]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";r = filter q by date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};r = filter q by 'Owner.Name' in {{selection(filter_activity_owner)}}; r = group r by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month');r = foreach r generate 'CreatedDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'CreatedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month', count()/unique('Owner.Id') as 'avg_activity_cnt', (case when \"{{no_quote(value(selection(filter_activity_owner)))}}\" == \"all\" && \"{{no_quote(value(selection(scatter_activity_per_case)))}}\" == \"all\" then \"ALL\" else \"Selected Agents\" end) as 'Performance'; s = group q by ('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month'); s = foreach s generate 'CreatedDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'CreatedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month', count()/unique('Owner.Id') as 'avg_activity_cnt', \"Team\" as 'Performance';u = union r, s; u = filter u by 'Performance' != \"ALL\";","autoFilter":true,"groups":[["CreatedDate_Year","CreatedDate_Month"],"Performance"]}

{"measures":[["perc","Percent"]],"pigql":"q = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";q = filter q by date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};q = group q by all;q = foreach q generate coalesce(({{ value(results(kpi_activity_per_agent))}} - ({{ value(results(kpi_total_activity))}}/{{ value(results(kpi_agent_count))}}))/ ({{value(results(kpi_total_activity))}}/{{ value(results(kpi_agent_count))}}),0)*100 as 'perc_Percent';","autoFilter":true,"groups":[]}

{"measures":[["avg","case_duration",null,{"display":"Average Case Duration"}],["sum","activity_per_case",null,{"display":"Avg Activity per Case"}],["sum","total_cases",null,{"display":"Number of Cases With Activities"}]],"pigql":"activity = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";activity = filter activity by date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};activity = group activity by 'Owner.Name';activity = foreach activity generate coalesce(count(), 0) / coalesce(unique('Case.Id'), 0) as 'sum_activity_per_case', coalesce(unique('Case.Id'), 0) as 'sum_total_cases',coalesce(avg('Case.{{no_quote(value(selection(Static_Duration)))}}'), 0) as 'avg_case_duration','Owner.Name' as 'Owner.Name';activity = limit activity 2000;","autoFilter":true,"groups":["Owner.Name"]}

{"pigql":"activity = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";activity = filter activity by date('CreatedDate_Year', 'CreatedDate_Month', 'CreatedDate_Day') in {{no_quote(value(field(selection(Time_Selection), 'Current')))}};activity = group activity by all;activity = foreach activity generate coalesce(count(activity), 0)/coalesce(unique('Owner.Name'), 0) as 'sum_avg_activity_per_agent';activity =limit activity 2000;","measures":[["sum","avg_activity_per_agent"]]}

Time_Selection.start: [[{"Compact":[["day",-180],["day",0]],"Current":"[\"180 days ago\"..\"current day\"]","GenerateActivityCreatedDate":"(case when count(s) > 0 then s['CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'] else sevent['CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'] end) as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'","GenerateCoGroupDate":"'CreatedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'","GenerateCoGroupDate2":"'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'","GenerateCreatedDate":"'CreatedDate_Year'+\"~~~\"+'CreatedDate_Month' as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'","GenerateSelectedActivityCreatedDate":"(case when count(r) > 0 then r['CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'] else revent['CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'] end) as 'CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month'","GroupbyCreatedDate2":"('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month')","GroupbyCreatedDateAccount":"('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','Owner.Id')","GroupbyCreatedDateMetric":"('CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month','Metric')","GroupbyCreatedDateOwner":"('Owner.Name','CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month')","GroupbyCreatedDateTask":"('CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month','Performance')","Grouping":"CreatedDate_Year~~~CreatedDate_Month","PartitionBy":"('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month')","compactGroup":["CreatedDate_Year","CreatedDate_Month"]}]]

query.query: {"measures":[["sum","completed_activity_pct"]],"pigql":"activity = load \"<ServiceActivity>\";comp_activity = filter activity by 'ActivityIsClosed' == \"Completed\";comp_activity = foreach comp_activity generate count() as 'cnt_comp_activities';result = group comp_activity by all full, activity by all;result = foreach result generate coalesce(sum(comp_activity.cnt_comp_activities), 0) / coalesce(count(activity), 0) * 100 as 'sum_completed_activity_pct';result = limit result 2000;","autoFilter":true,"groups":[]}
